reviews.name: GENERAC 6721 Automatic Standby Generator, 16kW
reviews.reviewText: We are very happy with this generator. It is quiet and has a nice appearance. The installation process went well and the self tests have been working weekly. I feel quite confident now that we are all set if the power goes out--a nice feeling especially because I have small children!
reviews.title: This product is worth the money!

reviews.name: GENERAC 6721 Automatic Standby Generator, 16kW
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this generator from a local dealer. Included the whole house transfer switch. Wanted the protection to keep heat and lights on during power outage. Fuel is natural gas which is ideal. Just had installed but have not needed yet so could not rate as excellent. Overall sturdy construction and test phase runs pretty quiet.
reviews.title: Whole house backup

reviews.name: GENERAC 6721 Automatic Standby Generator, 16kW
reviews.reviewText: we purchased our Generac in Sept 2014 and it was called in to action for the first time last night when our power went off during a frigid night. The Generac performed flawlessly and kept us warm and safe.
reviews.title: New Generac Performs Well

reviews.name: GENERAC 6721 Automatic Standby Generator, 16kW
reviews.reviewText: Generator installed today. Very quiet. Installers were very efficient, on time and did a timely job installing it under bad weather condition. They answered all questions and showed us what we needed to know and cleaned up like they were never here.
reviews.title: The Product is very quit

reviews.name: GENERAC 6721 Automatic Standby Generator, 16kW
reviews.reviewText: Should have spent extra money and purchased a unit that would have taken care of my whole home. 14KW does take care of the important items and every Monday morning it turns on and runs for 15 minutes. We had a outage for over 3 hours and the unit kicked it and ran perfectly------that's when we found out that we should have went larger. Unit is outside our bedroom wall, so it is at times louder that at other times. Since we bought our unit, other people in our housing area have also bought Generac generators for their homes.
reviews.title: I have the 14 KW which you did not list
